attributes.additional_details: Celtic should be disqualified for this year and have their points awarded to all other teams playing them due to their negligent behaviour. They have been went on illegal training trips to other countries whilst restrictions had been updated to full lockdown, they have allowed infected players to play games and pushed games back to cater for their selfish behaviour. They have had multiple players test positive and others who have went on holidays and thrown parties to break covid rules.
attributes.background: Celtic should be disqualified from the Scottish Premiership League due to multiple coronavirus breaches.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for the Scottish Professional Football League, not the UK Government or Parliament.
